items.sentence: Tom apologized to Mary for stepping on her foot.
There seems to be something wrong with my clock.
That news report is inconsistent with the facts.
My mother always gets up earlier in the morning.
I'm envious of you because you have a good boss.
Don't go out in this heat without wearing a hat.
I heard a crash at about ten o'clock last night.
I think doing that will take up most of my time.
When I'm using headphones I can't hear anything.
Is there anyone here who hasn't yet eaten lunch?
Tom probably doesn't even know where Mary lives.
Tom handed an envelope filled with cash to Mary.
Tell Tom I don't know why Mary isn't here today.
It's obviously going to be difficult to do that.
Tom made it clear he didn't want to work for us.
Tom knew Mary wanted him to ask her to the prom.
I'm going to tell them I won't be there on time.
I think you and I'd better have a talk with Tom.
It's hard to convince a fool of his foolishness.
What kind of things do you think we need to buy?
